de.mslab.ciphers

Interface TweakableCipher

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlockCipher, RoundBasedBlockCipher
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ThreeFish, ThreeFish1024, ThreeFish256, ThreeFish512

    public interface TweakableCipher
extends RoundBasedBlockCipher
    Interface for round-based symmetric ciphers which employ a tweak as an additional parameter for encryption or decryption, such as ThreeFish.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ByteArray getTweak()
      Returns the currently used tweak.
      int getTweakSize()
      Returns the size in bytes of the tweak.
      void setTweak(ByteArray tweak)
      Sets the tweak used as a parameter in encryption or decryption.

      • Methods inherited from interface de.mslab.ciphers.RoundBasedBlockCipher

        addRoundKey, canInvertKeySchedule, computeExpandedKey, computeKeyPart, decryptRound, decryptRounds, encryptRound, encryptRounds, getNumActiveComponentsInEncryption, getNumActiveComponentsInKeySchedule, getNumRounds, getRoundKey, hasKeyInjectionInRound, injectsKeyAtRoundBegin, injectsKeyAtRoundEnd

      • Methods inherited from interface de.mslab.ciphers.BlockCipher

        decrypt, encrypt, getExpandedKey, getKeySize, getName, getStateSize, operatesBytewise, operatesColumnwise, operatesNibblewise, setExpandedKey, setKey

    • Method Detail

      • getTweak

        ByteArray getTweak()
        Returns the currently used tweak.

      • getTweakSize

        int getTweakSize()
        Returns the size in bytes of the tweak.

      • setTweak

        void setTweak(ByteArray tweak)
        Sets the tweak used as a parameter in encryption or decryption. The tweak size is checked if it is equal to the expected size.
        Throws:
        InvalidTweakSizeError - The given tweak has an invalid size.
        See Also:
        getTweakSize()
